test_plan.description: Verify that the packages page loads and displays packages correctly with the new UI design

test_cases.description: Verify page loads with blue gradient background
steps: Verify background has gradient from #667eea to #764ba2
test_cases.expected_result: Page displays with blue gradient background

test_cases.description: Verify WiFi icon displays in header
steps: Check for WiFi icon in circular white background
test_cases.expected_result: WiFi icon and heading are visible
Packages load successfully and display in card format

test_cases.description: Verify package card layout matches design
steps: Verify cards have semi-transparent white background
Verify cards display package name, duration, price, and Select button
Verify cards are arranged vertically in centered container
test_cases.expected_result: Package cards match the UI design with proper layout

test_plan.description: Verify that users can select packages and are redirected appropriately

steps: Verify redirect to login page (if not authenticated)
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to login page when selecting a package without authentication

test_cases.description: Verify package data is stored in localStorage
test_cases.expected_result: Selected package data is stored in localStorage

test_plan.description: Verify that the UI is responsive and works on different screen sizes

steps: Verify layout adapts to mobile view
test_cases.expected_result: UI is responsive and displays correctly on mobile devices

test_plan.description: Verify proper error handling when packages fail to load

test_cases.description: Verify error message displays when API fails
test_cases.expected_result: Error message is displayed when packages fail to load
